alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 7:51PM CST until January 04 at 6:18AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Loosahatchie River at Arlington For the Loosahatchie River...including Arlington...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Loosahatchie River at Arlington. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Brief Road is flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 20.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CST Tuesday was 20.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 1.1 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
